resources.string: Here is a quick tutorial and description of our app. TourneyAssistant is for Tournament Directors and Team Captains. These 2 parties can use Tourney Assistant to communicate and share schedule information in 1 place.
This button is only visible to TDs. They can use this to create a new tournament.
This button show a list of games for the tournament you are currently viewing.
If you have any bugs or other concerns send them to jingley22@gmail.com . Otherwise, thanks for using the app!
This button shows you your profile where you can delete your account.
